text: Pramod Vyankatesh Mahajan (30 October 1949 â€“ 3 May 2006) was an Indian politician. At the time of his death, he was in a power struggle for the leadership of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). He was a member of the Rajya Sabha and a General Secretary of his party. As Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee's telecommunications minister between 2001 and 2003, he played a major role in India's cellular revolution. == Death == On 22 April 2006, Mahajan was shot by his estranged younger brother, Pravin in Mumbai. He died eleven days later at the age of 56. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Assassinated Indian politicians Category:Murders by firearm Category:Politicians from Telangana Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Pramod Mahajan
